#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main(){
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--){
        long long int N,M;
        cin>>N>>M;
        long long int pos = N*M;
        if(pos==1){
            cout<<"0/1\n";
            continue;
        }
        else{
            if(pos%2==0){
                cout<<"1/2\n";
            }
            else{
                long long int x=pos/2;
                cout<<x<<"/"<<pos<<"\n";
            }
        }
    }
}
